Summary: Disc shape appeared in cloudless sky banked to left than proceeded to do 1 1/2 s shaped pattern than vanished.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Burlington Flats
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting details i was taking lunch outdoors near goodyear lake setting were i had been setting for the past week and a half. it was a perfect day the sky was clear and blue. i was watching the jets fly over, like i always do when, right in m field of vision something caught my eye. right in front of me. it seemed to just phase in as a gary\silver slit in the sky and then it banked to the north. as it banked to my left got a good look at it. it was a silver gray disc. the disc then leveled out and all i could see was it's profile, like a silver tube. the object was traveling at a high speed, but not to the point that i could not follow it. the object then proceeded to travel about 20 second of arc in the sky banked to my right , were i got another good look at the disc shape. the object then proceeded to repeat this wide s shape pattern 1 and 1 1\2 times. back and forth. as it returned for the last s shape pass heading south it simply vanished, just as it appeared. the whole event lasted about 10 to 15 seconds. it happened in my direct view against a clear blue sky. i have a cell phone with a camera, but i could not get it out fast enough nor did i not to loss sight of the object. my reaction was complete excitement. i sat in my chain for a half an hour hoping that the object would reappear, but nothing. i have been an amateur astronomer for most of my life and have my head pointed to the sky when everyone is looking down. i never jump the gun to say something is a ufo. i understand that there are many naturally occurring phenomena. this was not one. in my lif time i have had five encounters with, what i know have been ufo sighting, but this is the first time i have reported it.
